settings.text: Discover our comprehensive collection of tools, equipment, and resources essential for engineering and start-up success. Simplify your procurement process with us.

settings.heading: Consulting
settings.text: We can give you advice on a broad range of topics including manufacturing, prototyping, engineering industry developments, start-up support, grants and resources tailored to your needs.

settings.heading: 2D & 3D CAD Modeling
settings.text: Need a visualisation of your idea, product design for manufacturing, 3D printing, technical drawings? We can do that for you - get in touch to bring your dream to reality!

settings.heading: Prototyping Services
settings.text: We offer a range of prototyping services in metal, wood, plastic, electronic wiring for products and so much more! If you're looking to get a prototype made of your product whether it's for a pitch, demonstration or for a pilot we've got you!

settings.heading: 3D Printing Services
settings.text:
We can create 3D printed products beyond your wildest dreams. FDM printing, sla, we've got it all! We're can print on demand in:

  • PLA (Basic, Matte, Silk, Silk Dual Color, Galaxy, Glow, Metal, CMYK Lithophane, Marble, CF, Gradient, Aero)
  • PETG (Basic, HF, Translucent, CF)
  • ASA (Aero)
  • ABS (GF, Sparkle)
  • PA (PA6-GF, PA6-CF, PAHT-CF)
  • PET (CF)
  • PC
  • TPU (95a hf,
  • Support (PVA, PLA/PA/PET/ABS)

For metals, manufacturing metals, standard materials, speciality materials and composite materials contact us directly to discuss your needs further.

settings.heading: Metal Working, Welding & CNC Services
settings.text: We provide a range of metal working services from foundry and lathe work, all the way up to welding and 3-axis CNC Machining.

settings.heading: Engineering Facility & Office Design
settings.text: Want to design an engineering facility? An office? A start-up in need of support to build facilities? We have your back with our floor plans, expert construction advice and contractor procurement.

settings.heading: Equipment, Manufacturing, Sourcing Material & Supplier Procurement
settings.text: We can help you buy and source the right equipment for your company. Find a manufacturer that fits your needs. Source materials - that are what they say they are! Find a supplier that fits your project.
